Html on phire heavy industries https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/tags/html/ Recent content in Html on phire heavy industries Hugo -- gohugo.io en Wed, 01 Jan 2020 00:00:00 +0000 phireheavyindustries.com https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/p/phireheavyindustries.com/ Wed, 01 Jan 2020 00:00:00 +0000 https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/p/phireheavyindustries.com/

Yes, it’s this site. This is made using the Hugo framework and is hosted on Porkbun. I find that the static content generator is a great tool to use for personal and small sites, but as any project, this is a work in progress. It’s still missing:

  • Integration with Flickr
  • Restricted access to some areas (so far, looks like it’s not possible)
  • Some blog content
